title: Macclesfield Town place job advert for ‘enthusiastic lion tamer’
text: Macclesfield Town place job advert for ‘enthusiastic lion tamer’ Monday, 26 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) • National League club offer voluntary role to work with club mascot • Successful applicant will ‘feed and exercise Roary’ Macclesfield Town are on the hunt for a marquee signing to bring to the Moss Rose Stadium, after placing an advert for an “enthusiastic lion tamer”. The club, who are currently mid-table in ... The Conference outfit are looking for a volunteer to help mascot 'Roary' on matchdays, including feeding and helping him exercise and telling him when to roar Goal.com 2 hours ago - Sports You Might Like Twitter Chatter Macclesfield Town place job advert for lion tamer https://t.co/Jv56ORLQhG 5 minutes ago Football FC!
